backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with data models, maps, IDs, and state for users, glossary, articles, research papers, learning sections, feedback, market data, and blogs, including authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for adding a donut chart component and replacing bar chart usage, mapping each feature to modified files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, UI roles, and behavior across pages and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark mode, applying global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, metadata, root div, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring router, theme provider, maintenance wrapper, layout components, calculators, blog pages, and query client.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty placeholder file for a bar chart component.
Pie chart component rendering invested vs earned amounts using SVG donut segments with labels and zero-state handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements an interactive chat assistant with intent detection, backend chat queries, UI controls, message history, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing NIFTY 50 market ticker with live/closed status and scrolling stock prices based on client-side IST market-hours detection.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: UI panel for exporting glossary snapshots and restoring them via merge or replace, including file parsing, validation, and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main site header with navigation, theme toggle, mobile menu, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Full-page maintenance notice with logo, icon, and explanatory message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages backend actors based on Internet Identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for maintenance mode, admin checks, user profiles, chat, glossary, and other backend‑driven data interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Provides Tailwind base layers and detailed light/dark theme tokens for the app’s design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays article categories with tabbed navigation and loads articles by category using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator that computes contributions based on age and desired pension with a UI for inputs and results.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a blog post with metadata, tags, content, and error handling for loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays a list of blogs with loading and error states, showing cards that link to individual blog pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a form to calculate CAGR based on initial value, final value, and years, with formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows categorized lists of financial calculators and navigates users to each calculator’s page.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact information and a feedback form that submits user messages via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Presents legal disclaimers and warnings about investment risks and the educational nature of the site's content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Interactive EMI calculator page that computes monthly payments, total interest, and repayment based on loan inputs.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: EPF calculator page that estimates contributions, interest, and maturity balance using salary and rate inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: FD calculator page that calculates maturity amount and interest using simple or compound interest options.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for viewing, filtering, and sorting user feedback with authentication and authorization checks.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Comparison tool that calculates fixed-interest vs reducing-balance loan costs and highlights interest differences.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable glossary with grouped terms, admin backup/restore, error handling, and reference navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Calculates gratuity using salary and years of service with eligibility checks and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a GST calculator that computes CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Computes home loan EMI, total repayment, and interest based on principal, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, feature cards, and navigation to learning, glossary, and research sections.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates HRA exemption and taxable HRA using salary components, rent, and city type.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays financial learning sections using an accordion, loading states, and data from useGetAllLearningSections.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump‑sum investment calculator using compound interest with user inputs and result display.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs and retirement parameters.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest earned using compound interest from user‑provided investment data.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates PPF maturity, interest earned, and total invested using yearly contributions and compounding logic.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a recurring deposit calculator with inputs for monthly investment, interest rate, and tenure, computing maturity value and displaying results.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI and RBI regulatory information with tabs, alerts, and investor protection guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and lists research papers with loading states, showing details and providing PDF downloads.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: A React page providing a simple‑interest calculator with inputs for principal, rate, and time, displaying computed interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: A comparison calculator page that computes simple and compound interest, including compounding frequency, and shows the difference between them.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a SIP calculator that computes future value based on monthly investment, return rate, and duration with a results breakdown chart.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana maturity value using yearly investment, child age, and fixed interest rate.
A step‑up SIP calculator page offering amount‑based and percentage‑based step‑up projections, computing total value, invested amount, and returns.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a Systematic Withdrawal Plan calculator that simulates monthly withdrawals, growth, and remaining balance over time.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: An XIRR calculator page allowing multiple dated cash flows and estimating XIRR using a Newton‑Raphson approximation.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utilities for detecting language, intent, and generating safe responses for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Shared formatting helpers for INR currency, Indian‑style numbers, and percentages.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parser utilities for glossary definitions, extracting main text and 'Also read' references, with normalization helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended typography, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, features, and versioned state for a React + TypeScript app backed by a Motoko canister.
